results.title: Insulin Sensitizers for Improving the Endocrine and Metabolic Profile in Overweight Women With PCOS
results.text_hl: ...For @<m>DISEASE_Overweight</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@, both @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combined with @GENE_GLP1R @GENE_2740 @@@GLP-1 receptor@@@ agonists and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combined with @CHEMICAL_Thiazolidinediones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D045162 @@@TZDs@@@ appear superior to monotherapy in improving @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@hyperandrogenemia@@@.

results.title: The Effect of Metformin on Polycystic Ovary Syndrome in Overweight Women: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis of Randomized Controlled Trials
results.text_hl: Therefore, we conducted a systematic review to assess the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Overweight</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ and to analyze the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Overweight</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@.

results.title: Comparative effects of acupuncture and metformin on insulin sensitivity in overweight/obese and lean women with polycystic ovary syndrome and insulin resistance: a post hoc analysis of a randomized trial
results.text_hl: Among @<m>DISEASE_Overweight</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@/@DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ outperformed acupuncture in reducing HOMA-IR levels (p = 0.004) and showed a significant drop from the baseline after 4 months (p < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Cao J, Nie G, Dai Z, Shan D, Wei Z. Comparative effects of acupuncture and metformin on insulin sensitivity in overweight/obese and lean women with polycystic ovary syndrome and insulin resistance: a post hoc analysis of a randomized trial Front Med (Lausanne). 2023;10():1232127.
